updates.title: Donate Gingerbread Kits for our Community
updates.description: Sponsor a community member's holiday experience! $60 provides a complete gingerbread kit with icing, candies, decorations, shipping, plus a gift card and access to our live virtual building session with prizes. Help create belonging and connection for foster youth this holiday season.

updates.title: Holiday Gift Drive 2025
updates.description: Choose a gift from our interactive Christmas tree and bring holiday joy to a Foster Greatness community member. Every gift creates connection and celebrates belonging.

updates.title: Donate to FG's Crisis Fund
updates.description: Your donation provides emergency assistance to those impacted by foster care in our community when they need it mostâ€”quickly and directly.

updates.title: Storyteller Collective Guide
updates.description: Written entirely by people with lived experience in foster care, this 60+ page resource transforms storytelling from an act of vulnerability into a tool for empowerment.

updates.title: Meal Kit Sponsorship Program
updates.description: Partner with us to create belonging for 75 foster youth families this Thanksgiving through meal kits, cookbooks, and virtual cooking events.
